snippet: Random House hopes the creator of "Girls" can enjoy the same success as Tina Fey did with her memoir.
abstract: Random House hopes the creator of "Girls" can enjoy the same success as Tina Fey did with her memoir.

headline.main: Lena Dunham Signs Book Deal for More Than $3.5 Million
headline.print_headline: Lena Dunham Book Deal Tops $3.5 Million
